title: "Quantitative analysis of abnormalities in gynecologic cytopathology with deep learning"
excerpt: "This manuscript describes a methodology to quantify the abnormalities in digital cytology images. This automatic AI-system incorporates deep learning structures, mathematical algorithms, and image processing methods to locate and segment abnormal and suspicious cells."
